scripts.rebuild:store: npm run clean:artifacts && npm ci && npm run build:store
scripts.rebuild:github: npm run clean:artifacts && npm ci && npm run build:github
scripts.pack:store: npm run build:store && node scripts/pack-release.mjs Lekkerboxd-store.zip dist-store
scripts.pack:github: npm run build:github && node scripts/pack-release.mjs Lekkerboxd-github.zip dist-github
scripts.pack:all: npm run pack:store && npm run pack:github
scripts.ci:check:store: npm run check:privacy && npm run build:store && npm run test
scripts.ci:check:github: npm run check:privacy && npm run build:github && npm run test
